## Icon Request Type

- [ ] Add new icon(s) from existing upstream library
- [ ] Update existing icon(s) to match upstream
- [ ] Request entirely new custom icon(s)

## Icon Library

Which icon library does this request relate to?

- [ ] Lucide Icons
- [ ] Bootstrap Icons
- [ ] Material Design Icons
- [ ] Other (please specify)

## Icon Name(s)

List the icon name(s) from the upstream library:

1. `icon-name-1`
2. `icon-name-2`
3. `icon-name-3`

## Upstream Reference

Provide links to the icons in the upstream library:

- Lucide: https://lucide.dev/icons/[icon-name]
- Bootstrap: https://icons.getbootstrap.com/#icons
- Material Design: https://fonts.google.com/icons

## Use Case

Describe your use case for these icons:

**Example:**
"I'm building a dashboard application and need these icons for navigation..."

## Version Information

- **Current Package Version**: 1.0.2
- **Upstream Library Version**: (if known)

## Verification

Before submitting, please verify:

- [ ] I searched the package to confirm these icons don't already exist
- [ ] I checked the icon exists in the upstream library
- [ ] I provided the correct icon name from the upstream library

## Icon Already Exists?

If the icon already exists in the upstream library but not in this package:

- **When was it added to upstream?**
- **Which version of the upstream library includes it?**

## Additional Context

Add any other context, screenshots, or examples about the icon request here.

## Workaround

Are you currently using a workaround? If so, please describe it.

## Priority

How important is this icon request to your project?

- [ ] Critical - blocking current work
- [ ] High - needed soon for upcoming feature
- [ ] Medium - would be nice to have
- [ ] Low - future enhancement
